author: morciuch
msg: Reworked the weather portlet (see Bugzilla bug# 20593):
1. Got rid of the custom customizer

Also, introduced another parameter type: invisible. This is used to render parameter as hidden inputs so other parameters can actually set their values behind the scenes (weather location is an example of this).
